channel.title: Comments on: REVIEW: …And You Will Know Us By The Trail Of Dead, So Divided, Interscope

item.title: By: Trail of Dead book European tour for late summer
item.dc:creator: Trail of Dead book European tour for late summer
item.description: [...] According to Merlin over at trailofdead.com, â€¦And You Will Know Us by the Trail of Dead has a summer tour plotted for Europe, kicking off in Portugal on August 5. The shows mix club dates with traditional festival stops. The band is still supporting last fall’s So Divided. [...]

The shows mix club dates with traditional festival stops. The band is still supporting last fall’s So Divided. […]
